Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: don suhan
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money for a inexpensive Laptop. You can access the internet if you have wifi.  Play a google game while you are away from your home computer. I does have it drawbacks but for the money a good product.

Reviews.Title: Small might be too small
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Came in the mail promptly.I have had this for some days now and I find myself reverting back to my older computer. Also this is Android powered which completely defeated the point of my purchase-Please keep that in mind if you are trying to purchase a Windows operated device. The screen is just way too small for me too. Should have read the description.I will see how it does if I travel, but for now I am typing on my Mac Air as we speak...Should tell you something.
